pageProduct.name: QV Wash 1.25L
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Wash is an effective, soap-free cleanser made for normal, dry and sensitive skin. Lightly foaming on the skin, you can use it every day to leave skin soft and supple.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid eyes.  For external use only.  If lather enters eyes, rinse with clean water.  If irritation occurs, discontinue use.  Store below 30°C.
Always read the label. Use only as directed.
If symptoms persist please see your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Recommended for cleansing dry skin.
• Maintains skin’s natural protective properties.
• Won’t strip away natural oils like soap can.
• pH balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol.
• Suitable for sensitive skin types, including infants and the elderly.
• Suitable for sun-damaged skin and dry skin conditions.

Ingredients

Aqua (water), sodium lauryl sulphate, Glycerin, lauryl Betaine, disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, peg-120 methyl glucose dioleate, glycol stearate, methylparaben, citric acid, propylparaben.

Directions

Use daily in the shower or bath. Apply desired amount of QV Wash to wet skin and lightly massage. Rinse and gently pat skin dry.
